attributes.action: Please tell the Queen she has the support of the British people.
attributes.additional_details: Mrs May, please communicate our support and best wishes to Her Majesty.
attributes.background: Over the course of her reign the Queen has made six state visits to the United States of America and hosted four state visits from US presidents. We, the undersigned, stand in solidarity with our monarch. We recognise and appreciate Her Majesty's outstanding contribution to Anglo-American relations.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  If you would like to show your support for President Trump's  state visit, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844
